info.description: Thornmail Jarvan IV build for ARAM. Counter physical damage, stack Armor or don't play at all!
how it works: Hit or miss. Works only if an enemy team is full of physical damage dealers (preferably auto-attackers).
If an enemy team is full of mages/AP damage, play regular tank build instead.
how to play: How is this Thornmail build for Jarvan IV different to regular tank builds? Item order, Armor stacking and countering enemy physical damage dealers!
This build is aimed to counter AD comps. Since you don't know the enemy team, you need to adapt in game. It is hit or miss. If they are heavy AP - just play regular tank.
Late game, you can consider selling boots for 6th item - for even more sweet Thornmail damage!
Be careful to not waste Aftershock. Try timing it and keeping it for going in.
tricks champion: You can use Demacian Standard (E) for brush control.
Remember that Dragon Strike (Q) reduces target's armor!
Switch targets often in fights to fully use your Martial Cadence (Passive) for more damage!
Combo #1: Q + E + Flash. Just Q + E and during the last frames of animation, you can Flash into enemy knocking them up.

Combo #2: If you have enough Ability Haste, you can put E, wait and Q to it and cast second E hitting your target. This is especially cool with AP builds. So you can cast E while sliding to existing E.
tricks champion riot: You can use the Dragon Strike / Demacian Standard combo to get out of your own Cataclysm arenas.
Split your basic attacks on different champions at the beginning of fights to maximize damage.
Use Demacian Standard as a scouting tool when worried about incoming enemies.

tooltip: If you feel like it's going to be last fight:
Elixir of Iron - for more survivability and vs CC.
